description: When bookish Moka Mora is kidnapped by a covert Russian operative, John Strong, she is made to create propaganda designed to destabilize the state. But when Moka resists, John kidnaps her cousin, Kimber Woods, and turns both girls into his Anal Assets. This update includes hard anal sex in tight bondage with two beautiful hardcore sluts, gags, flogging, electricity, sexual coercion and covert cross-domain warfare.
title: Anal Assets
